items.description: A React-based task manager with hooks and the Reducer pattern. Features include adding, completing, deleting, and filtering tasks, plus light/dark mode switching.

items.title: Pokedex
items.description: A collaborative project using Scrum (Kanban). Built with React and React Router, it fetches PokÃ©mon data from an API. Uses useState and useEffect for state management. (Work in progress).

items.title: Next Universe
items.description: A game-inspired project (similar to OGame) in development. Backend: Node.js with MongoDB. Frontend: React.

about.title: Presentation
about.heading: Gonzalo SÃ¡nchez
about.presentation: My primary focus is web development, using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript (with an emphasis on React) for the frontend, and Python and Node.js for the backend. I'm skilled in managing databases like MongoDB, MySQL, and PostgreSQL and have experience with TypeScript and Redux for React applications. I'm a dedicated self-learner with a solid foundation from Senpai Academy's bootcamp, where I honed technical and teamwork skills. Proficient in agile methodologies (Scrum/Kanban) and tools like Git, Jira, Postman, and Jest. Always seeking new challenges to grow. Fluent in English (B2 level) for international collaboration.

education.course: Python sin fronteras: HTML, CSS, Flask y MySQL
